Posts.Title: drugs

Posts.Content: Does anyone have a memory problem,i have been taking hormone injections for the past 2 months it has affected my short-term memory.I am also weaker and my bones ache in my hips and shoulder.
Posts.Title: memory

Posts.Content: i have been told to get my diabetes under better control before i can have any radiotherapy treatment,i have been taking Zoladex for 3months but cannot have the radiotherapy for another 2 to 3 months after another CT scan if my diabetics are improved.gleason 4+3 psa 33.The side effects are not to good,with the Zoladex but been told the radiotherapy side effect are worse if the diabetics are not in better control.
Posts.Title: diabetic

Posts.Content: hi My gleason score is 4+3 my psa reading is 33 its the only one i have,started taking Bicalutamide 50mg going to have injection of Zoladex 3.5 in 2 weeks time it lasts a month first time and longer the next time. Thanks chris
Posts.Title: treatment

Posts.Content: hi all i am going to be given hormone treatment for now: gleason is 7 the cancer has spread to the groin lymph nodes and there is something on my right lung i am being sent for a ct scan on my lungs nexted,after that its radiotherapy. To all the people who replied to me,i would like to thank you all as you help me so much when i first found out i was pc.
Posts.Title: treatment

Posts.Content: I am on zoladex for the past 6 months, because of my other illness my radiaition treatment will not take place next week,and i will be looked at again in 4 months. My prostate cancer is 4+3 gleason.bilateral modes both sides infected very high cancer in the prostate from the biopsy.If my heath does not improve must i stay on the Zoladex and for how long.

Posts.Content: Thanks for all your answers. I have seen a oncologist and he said because of all my comorbidities it would do more harm then good to my body so the radiotherapy is to be tryed again in october. The hormone injection can carry on being give as it seems to have stopped the cancer from get any bigger.i am getting some pain in my left side were my modes are as being swollen
